title: Understanding why I was banned
body:
Hi,

Can someone please explain to me why i was banned when i didn't say any cuss words and another player was being toxic to me the whole game?? I feel like it was an admin that banned me for an argument that i chose to be the bigger person and mute him. Can you please help me understand? I've spent several hundreds of dollars on skins on my account and i'd really appreciate an understanding. Also, can you please post what the other person said to me and explain how i get banned when he was worse than anything i said? He provoked everything and then I get banned?

Thanks.

MyArmsRahri

replies.body: Sure. Post the chat logs from your ban.

Can you please help me get unbanned? If you look at my prior games I was doing my best to be a much better member of league and this person provoked everything. I would really appreciate your support. Below are my chat logs.

Thank you for your help.

MyArmsRAhri

"...for an arguement that I chose to be the bigger person and mute him"... 

Proceeds to call him a moron, idiot, dumb as dirt, my favorite very big person comeback; "says the clueless tf", ur garb, lots of mature things like get me out, stay silver, ur trash, etc... 

Are you sure you were being the bigger person and muting them?

If you saw what the other person said to me, i stopped the confrontation and we won the game after the other person was much worse and provoked everything. I even helped him play better and assisted him in everything.

Sorry I had to do some work earlier. Thank you for getting back so quickly. Please see below:

I'd also like to mention that TF i was saying is twisted fate. not a cuss word.


Game 1

Cuss word do not get you banned.  You can fucking say any fucking shit you want in-game and you'll never be punished for it.  Only when you turn that "fuck" into "fuck you" will that get you banned.  In any case, it is irrelevant to your punishment.  I'm just letting you know that cuss word alone do not get people punished.

You did engaged in quite a bit of flaming.  This chat log is fairly mild, but still toxic albeit mild.  If you have a pattern of this type of mild behavior in majority of your games and you've already had the 10 and 25 chat restriction, then the punishment is 14-day ban.  If this is perma, then you must already had the 14-day.  Do not think of it as THIS chat log got you banned.  Think of it as this chat log PLUS the previous punishments got you banned because that is how Rito's punishment system work.  Your past toxic/punishment history ALWAYS get taken into consideration when issuing next punishment.

Can you please help me get unbanned? If you look at my prior games I was doing my best to be a much better member of league and this person provoked everything. I would really appreciate your support. 

Thank you for your help.

MyArmsRAhri
As you can tell from the other responses, there's really no discussion to be had unless you share your chat logs.

Can you please help me get unbanned? If you look at my prior games I was doing my best to be a much better member of league and this person provoked everything. I would really appreciate your support. Chat logs are now posted. Sorry for the delay.

Thank you for your help.

MyArmsRAhri

Nobody here can help you get unbanned, we're just regular players like you.

 If you want to get in contact with someone who can help you, file a support ticket on the Riot support website. However, they don't overturn bans unless they were made in error and that doesn't seem to be the case here.
The fact that you don't see any problem with your behavior when you spent the entire time on insults and name-calling is exactly why you were banned.
